channel.title: Socials on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Socials on Blog

item.title: Join us on Instagram
Follow us on Facebook
item.description: Do not forget to follow us on Facebook. You can contact us and stay updated on all that’s going on at IVRPowers and on the latest news about RTC or IVR. Join us and stay tuned for new information at https://www.facebook.com/ivrpowers/

item.title: Join us on Tumblr
item.description: You can easily track what’s happening at IVRPowers by following us on Tumblr. Keep up to date about the most advanced RTC and IVR solutions and breakthrough technologies. Follow us at http://tumblr.ivrpowers.com/

item.title: Follow us on Twitter
item.description: Be sure to follow us on Twitter with great brand updates, promotions and news about all things RTC or IVR. Our hand is @ivrpowers and our favorite hashtags right now are #RTC and #IVR. Give us a shout out! https://twitter.com/ivrpowers
